eventTitle: MANNHEIM  JEWEL YACHT May 22  11:30pm-4am  ( boarding 11:30pm-12am SHARP)
eventLocation: 2430 FDR Drive Service Rd East, New York, NY 10010
eventDescription:
Na.. Hallo Sexy Boys... GET. YOUR. TICKETS. NOW. That was your warning, Queen.

Join us on another journey at sea right here in fucking Manhattan.. no Ubers to Brooklyn and back ( saves you $60 already ) .. no secret locations either. .. this time we sail out at sea and use NYC as our back drop as we rock this fucking city to its core to the beats of NYC's own ........

>> DJ Shane Marcus <<

You dont want to miss this.

The Yacht is equipped with brandnew sound system and lights that will take you to the next level. Are..... you..... ready? Y'all dont hear me... Are you Ready!?

This time we enjoy ourselves with no fears or shut downs and no problems. The boat has a huge outdoor rooftop with bar and a downstairs area with bar too. Everyone will have ample space spread out and move about.

JEWEL Yacht

Boarding is 11:30-12am Sharp!

We sail 12-4am

Please don't be late or else you run the chance of getting left. We all want as much time out on the water as possible.

Coat check is available $5 CASH... please bring cash!

There are seriously limited tickets.. get one before they are gone. There is only so much room on a yacht.

Syport Marina 2430 FDR Drive Service Rd East ( 23rd Street and FDR Drive )

<<<<<<<<<

>>>>>>>>>

Danke viel Mals, und Aufweidersehen.....see you soon....

eventTitle: BORIS [ BELIEVE Sightseeing Cruise ] SUNDAY MAY 23
eventDescription:
Super excited to announced the one and only New York finest legend Dj-producer BORIS to our May calendar! The Believe sightseeing cruise is the last but definitely no the lease of our Klandest boat announcements for the month!

For the Transmit recording boss label it's all about the music. New York stalwart and beloved DJ, Boris. lives by that statement. A career forged over decades of long nights in the big Apple's most revered rooms. Boris will is constantly on the tips of the younger generation's tongue. Why? Because talent, like wine, gets better with age.

Are you a believer? Believe you will dance all day long!

Opening set by raising superstar Niia Guerra

Capacity is very limited! 2 floors. Notice this is a fully heated boat both inside our main floor and outside on our deck/terrace floor with 360 sky views.

Tables packages strongly recommended and are including admission for 4/ 6 / 8 / 10 /12 people tables available.

You will be boarding the Jewel Cruise one of the finest boats in the city. Newly renovated with amazing LED builded in lights, top of the line sound with brand new interiors and last but not lease a breathtaking terrace with complete full view of New York. A 4 hours ride will take you around Hudson rive passing by the statute of liberty and experiencing beautiful NYC skyline sunset.

Boarding starts at 1pm.

Tables RSVP/ VIP or Any questions text 347.620.6024. (We only reply text).

General admission tickets now on sale while supplies last.

Food will be available for purchase.

*** Covid guidelines must be followed *** Strictly limited capacity/ Mask are mandatory/ Temperature taken at the door/ Outdoor Areas only/ Hand sanitizers/ Intimate + Secluded tables.

All sales are final. Rise or shine. This is a completely legal sightseeing cruise.

eventTitle: Prince Purple Rain at Dreamland Roller Disco at Lakeside
eventDescription:
Lola Star's Dreamland Disco is back for the Spring + Summer 2021 Season with more socially distanced roller disco MAGIC!

*Please note: this event is 21+ (Valid Photo ID required for entry)

Lola Star’s Dreamland Roller Disco at Lakeside in Prospect Park is a themed, dress up, immersive roller skating experience that will transport you into a fabulous retro roller disco “dreamland.”

Each Dreamland Roller Disco includes

  • Retro DJs spinning the hottest dance floor grooves from the 70s, 80s, 90s and today
  • An MC who narrates the spectacle as it unfolds
  • Tons of rad, Instagram-able moments including a red carpet where you can take photos
  • Birthday shout-outs - bring your birthday crew, the party is ON
  • and more exciting surprises!

COVID-19 SAFETY GUIDELINES

● Attendance at our events will be drastically limited to ensure social distancing on and off the rink.

● We will be taking guest temperature upon entry to the event.

● Skaters must remain at least six feet apart from other skaters while on the rink, sitting on benches and waiting for restroom unless you are part of the same party.

● All individuals entering the facility must wear face coverings. Face coverings must be worn at all times, even while skating

● Hand sanitizer will be available for skaters.

● Guests should wash their hands promptly if you touch your face, following hand-washing guidelines, using soap and water for at least 20 seconds

● Guests must stay home if you feel sick or have a fever.

● Rental Skates will be cleaned and sanitized after every use.

● Lockers and restrooms are cleaned and sanitized regularly

● All roller rink staff are required to wear face coverings and complete daily temperature checks.

EVENT TIME

7:00PM - 10:00PM

Doors open at 6:30PM and Access to the rink starts starts promptly at 7:00PM

2021 THEMES

April 23 - Soul Train

April 30 - 90s Hip Hop

May 7 - Mean Girls vs Clueless - 90s and 00s Pop

May 14 - Beyoncé

May 21 - Saturday Night Fever

May 28 - Prince Purple Rain

June 4 - Boy Bands vs Girl Pop

June 11 -Gaga vs Madonna

June 18 - Soul Train

June 25 - 90s Hip Hop

July 2 - Taylor Swift vs Justin Bieber

July 9 - Roll Bounce - Retro Roller Rink Classics

July 16 - Britney vs Rihanna

July 23 - Spice Girls in Xanadu

July 30 - Beyoncé vs Jay-Z

Aug 6 - Dancing Queen - Disco

Aug 13 - 90s Hip Hop

Aug 23 - 00s Girl Power - Taylor Swift, Katy Perry, Miley Cyrus

Aug 27 - Bowie vs Freddie - Glam Rock, Queen

Sept 3 - Beverly Hills 90210 - 90s Pop

Sept 10 - Beyoncé

Sept 17 - Shimmer Disco

Sept 24 - 90s Hip Hop

Oct 1 - Prince Purple Rain

Oct 8 - Soul Train

Oct 15 - Mean Girls vs Clueless - 90s and 00s Pop

Oct 22 - Zombie Disco

DRESS UP

Dress up in the most fabulous, retro inspired outfit in your closet and join us on the dance floor! Retro Roller Disco outfits, glitter, sparkle, glitz & glam costumes are highly recommended! (but not mandatory)

WALK-UP / DAY OF TICKET SALES POLICY

If the event is not sold out in advance, day of, walk up sales will only be allowed on a first come first serve basis at the door (Price: $26/PP). If the event is sold out, tickets may also become available if there are any cancellations or no-shows for existing ticket holders. Please be aware that there is no guarantee you will be able to purchase a ticket the day of the event. Thank you for your understanding.

SKATE RENTALS

Skate Rentals are included in your Admission ticket!

Our skate rentals go up to a size 15. You are welcome to bring your own roller skates or roller blades to wear. The rink is a polished concrete surface. Indoor wheels are recommended.

PROTECTIVE GEAR

Helmets, knee pads, and wrist pads are available to rent.

Helmets: $6 / Knee Pads: $3 / Wrist Pads: $3

Roller Skating is a sport. If you do not want to accept the risks involved in roller skating, we advise you to refrain from participating. All guests are required to sign an acknowledgement of risk release form before entry into Dreamland Roller Disco.

LOCKERS

Small: $3 / Large: $8

CAFE & BAR

Lakeside offers a variety of food and beverage options from our outdoor bar, including beer, wine and specialty cocktails!

PRO TIPS

  • We are operating at a very limited and reduced capacity so please buy your tickets in ADVANCE. Lola Star Dreamland Disco Events were SOLD OUT last year and this year we will have far fewer tickets.
  • We strongly recommend arriving before 8:30pm as Skate Rentals are not guaranteed due to limited supply. 
  • Be sure to CONFIRM your requested DATE in your order prior to completing your purchase.

TICKET & PACKAGE RATES

  • Advance General Admission: $24/person 
  • General Admission and Drink Ticket: $32/person
  • VIP Table Package (for 4 guests): $160
  • VIP Table Package (for 10 guests): $395

(includes event admission and skate rentals)

HOST YOUR PARTY AT DREAMLAND ROLLER DISCO

We would love to celebrate with you and your roller disco crew and make your birthday, graduation, bachelor or bachelorette, team victory (and more) party a super fun and memorable occasion. 

Solid Gold Disco Queen/King Package (minimum of 15 guests) - $725

  • VIP admission
  • Skate rentals
  • Private Party room rental
  • Buckets of Beer and Wine
  • Platter of Mozzarella Sticks, Chips & Dip, Fries
  • Add additional guests for $50/person
  • Must be booked 2 weeks in advance
  • Inquire within at Events@lakesidebrooklyn.com

Roller Disco Birthday Party Package (minimum of 15 guests) - $825

  • VIP admission
  • Skate rentals
  • Private Party room rental
  • Birthday Decor
  • Birthday Shout out by the MC
  • Option to participate in the “Birthday Dance Party”
  • Buckets of Beer and Wine
  • Complimentary Bottle of Champagne
  • Assorted Sandwich Platter, Chips & Dip, Fries
  • Add additional guests for $55/person
  • Must be booked 2 weeks in advance
  • Inquire within at Events@lakesidebrooklyn.com

Bachelorette/Bachelor Celebration Package (minimum of 15 guests) - $825

  • VIP admission
  • Skate rentals
  • Private Party room rental
  • Bachelorette/Bachelor Party Decor
  • Special Shout out to the Bachelorette/Bachelor and their crew by the MC
  • Buckets of Beer and Wine
  • Complimentary Bottle of Champagne
  • Assorted Sandwich Platter, Chips & Dip, Fries
  • Add additional guests for $55/person
  • Must be booked 2 weeks in advance
  • Inquire within at Events@lakesidebrooklyn.com

Taxes and/or Fees apply to all ticket types and packages

DIRECTIONS

Subway: B, Q, and S trains to Prospect Park station

Vehicles are not allowed inside Prospect Park. Only street parking is available.

FINE PRINT

  • Lola Star's Dreamland Disco advance tickets and packages are only valid for the date indicated on the receipt. Tickets/Packages are non-refundable and non-transferable. All sales are final.
  • Doors open at 6:30pm. Access to the Rink starts promptly at 7:00pm.
  • Rain or Shine. Please check www.lakesidebrooklyn.com in case of extreme weather conditions for any cancellations.
  • We strongly recommend arriving before 8:30pm as Skate Rentals are not guaranteed due to limited supply. Socks must be worn with all skate rentals.
  • No change or partial credit will be provided for any components of the package (including Food & Beverage Vouchers not redeemed during the event). This offer has no cash value.
  • All guests are to comply with the 2021 Terms and Conditions of Lakeside Brooklyn, LLC.
